description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Celebration of the Two-Hundredth Anniversary of the Incorporation of Bridgewater ... June 3. 1856; including the address by Hon. Emory Washburn ... poem by James Reed ... and the other exercises of the occasion. With an appendix, etc" Author: Centennial Celebration Committee (BRIDGEWATER, Massachusetts) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10411.g.35." Page: 12 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1856 Publisher: J. Wilson & Son Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000471079 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
